explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of modern machine learning techniques for financial time series forecasting.
explanations.supervised learning: The proposed method, MS-LS-SVM, is a supervised learning approach as it involves training a model on labeled data for forecasting.
explanations.regression: The paper focuses on forecasting financial time series, which is a regression task.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper proposes a multi-scale sparse least squares support vector machine (MS-LS-SVM) for forecasting.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as a technique used in the proposed method for time series forecasting.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions artificial neural network (ANN) as one of the modern machine learning techniques used in time series forecasting.
